game.name: WIZARD PUNKS!!!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 통계, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: WIZARD PUNKS!!! is a fast-paced, spell-slinging 4-player local party game. Create spells by combining the four elements of Air, Earth, Fire and Water, and defeat your fellow wizards with a variety of bombastic magics.
game.shortDescriptionEn: WIZARD PUNKS!!! is a fast-paced, spell-slinging 4-player local party game. Create spells by combining the four elements of Air, Earth, Fire and Water, and defeat your fellow wizards with a variety of bombastic magics.
